product_name: The North Face Denali Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Denali men's jacket is a straightforward, comfortable, all-around fleece for winter climates. Wear it as a mid layer or outer layer, depending on conditions. Polartec(R) 300 Series fleece (87% recycled content in the solid colors and 65% in the heathered) is warm, lightweight and compressible. Abrasion-resistant, laundered 2-ply nylon (also recycled) on upper body and elbows provides reinforcement and durability. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Pit zippers provide ventilation to help keep your body temperature regulated. Elastic-bound cuffs and hem drawcord. Features zippered hand pockets and both Napoleon and horizontal chest pockets. Standard fit provides easy layering. Wear the Denali jacket on its own or zipped into complementing parkas from The North Face.
short_description: The North Face Denali men's jacket is a straightforward, comfortable, all-around fleece for winter climates. Wear it as a mid layer or outer layer, depending on conditions.
